name: PongClone (ZolEntertainment)
description:
NOTE: To fully enjoy the game, make sure to hit the Full Screen blue button, in the lower right corner of the screen!

PongClone

Description

This is my clone version of the all time classic PONG game.

Single Player - Defeat the evil RED player

Multiplayer - Share one keyboard with a friend or a family member! 
The first to score 3 goals wins the match!

Controls

  • Player One
    • Movement: W to go up & S to go down
  • Player Two
    • Movement: O to go up & L to go down 
    • Alternative movement: Up arrow & Down arrow
  • Restart the Game - R button
  • Back to Main Menu - M button

Extra

Alternative control keys have been added for Player 2 - Arrow keys are functioning as well.

Another Scene has been added to the game - "Information" which serves as a shared scene with Credits and Controls help.

Special Thanks to James Doyle

The game has been created after finishing his UDEMY course "Learn to Program by Making Games in Unity ".
